handlers.code:
-- Find the elements
for key, slot in pairs(unit) do
	if type(slot) == "table" and type(slot.export) == "table" then
		if slot.getStringValue then
			databank = slot
		end
	end
end

LastContent = ""

local content = databank.getStringValue("content")
if content ~= nil and content ~= "" and content ~= LastContent then
	system.setScreen(content)
     system.showScreen(1)
    LastContent = content
elseif content == "" then
    system.showScreen(0)
end
